Uses of Class
net.minecraftforge.event.server.ServerLifecycleEvent

Packages that use ServerLifecycleEvent
Package
Description
net.minecraftforge.event.server
 

  • Uses of ServerLifecycleEvent in net.minecraftforge.event.server

    Subclasses of ServerLifecycleEvent in net.minecraftforge.event.server
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ServerAboutToStartEvent
    Called before the server begins loading anything.
    class 
    ServerStartedEvent
    Called after ServerStartingEvent when the server is available and ready to play.
    class 
    ServerStartingEvent
    Called after ServerAboutToStartEvent and before ServerStartedEvent.
    class 
    ServerStoppedEvent
    Called after ServerStoppingEvent when the server has completely shut down.
    class 
    ServerStoppingEvent
    Called when the server begins an orderly shutdown, before ServerStoppedEvent.
